article.class: post-10322 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district post-with-thumbnail post-with-thumbnail-icon

a.title: Permalink to School Closure Extended Through May 15

header.div: Posted on April 16, 2020April 17, 2020 by Catskill CSD

div.p: (April 16 2020) Today, Governor Cuomo announced that all school districts in New York State will remain closed through May 15, 2020 as part of his extension of the statewide PAUSE to help protect the public against the spread of the COVID-19 virus.

article.class: post-10282 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district post-with-thumbnail post-with-thumbnail-icon

a.title: Permalink to Important Letter from Dr. Cook – April 17, 2020 – 4th Quarter Grading Expectations / Delivery of Unclaimed Student Work

h1.a: Important Letter from Dr. Cook – April 17, 2020 – 4th Quarter Grading Expectations / Delivery of Unclaimed Student Work

header.div: Posted on April 15, 2020April 17, 2020 by Catskill CSD

div.p: I thank you again for your patience and willingness to work with us through this challenging situation. Thank you to our entire staff for their hard work with preparing our students for extended learning, meal preparation, sanitizing our buildings and child care. Thank you to our students and families for your patience and understanding as we move forward to the next phase of school closure.

article.class: post-10210 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district category-high-school post-with-thumbnail post-with-thumbnail-icon

a.title: Permalink to June, 2020 Regents Exams Canceled

header.div: Posted on April 7, 2020April 7, 2020 by Catskill CSD

div.p: (April 7, 2020) The NYS Education Department (NYSED) has canceled all June, 2020 Regents Examinations in response to the COVID-19 emergency. Because of this cancelation, NYSED has changed the requirements that students must meet in order to earn high school diplomas, credentials, and endorsements. Students who were intending to take one or more Regents Exam […]

img.alt: Image of virus and the words coronavirus resources

a.title: Permalink to Coronavirus Resources for Parents, Students & Teachers

h1.a: Coronavirus Resources for Parents, Students & Teachers

header.div: Posted on April 6, 2020April 6, 2020 by Catskill CSD

div.p: Catskill Central School District has put together a Coronavirus (COVID-19) related resource webpage for parents, students, and staff. Links to the page are available on our website’s homepage, on our CCSD Families Page, and on each of our schools’ homepages. You can also navigate to it directly here…

- Athletics
- Board of Education
- Bully Prevention
- Budget Information
- Calendar
- Capital Improvement Project
- Coronavirus/COVID-19 Resources
- District Goals
- Employment Opportunities
- Food Services / Menus
- Google Classroom
- Live Streaming Events
- Register a Student
- Special Education
- Staff Training Links
- Superintendent's Corner
- Tax Information
- Transportation

Catskill Central School District
Dr. Ronel Cook, Superintendent
341 West Main Street • Catskill, NY 12414
(518) 943-4696
